original_title: もし内緒でHしようと誘われたら
overview: Unexpected free time in a closed room alone after Gonzo shooting. In such a case, if a beautiful girl tempts you with "Do you want to have sex again?" It's not what I hoped for, but it's against the rules to have sex. If you find out, you'll be in big trouble! But this is a trap set by the staff and the girls! A man's morals are put to the test in front of the temptation that adult site S-Cute must never do or ride! !
title: What If You Were Secretly Invited To Have Sex
